title: SSW Partners
subTitle: We are Partners with big companies

partnersList.name: Microsoft
partnersList.description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation headquartered in Redmond, Washington.

partnersList.name: IdentityServer
partnersList.description: IdentityServer is an officially certified implementation of OpenID Connect. Single Sign-on / Sign-out. Single sign-on (and out) over multiple application types.

partnersList.name: Octopus
partnersList.description: Octopus is the only deployment tool with built-in multi-tenancy support. Deploy to two, ten, or thousands of customers without duplicating the deployment

partnersList.name: Zendesk
partnersList.description: Zendesk is award-winning customer service software trusted by 200K+ customers. Make customers happy via text, mobile, phone, email, live chat, social media.

partnersList.name: Control4
partnersList.description: 4Sight from Control4 allows you to be alerted of things at home while you're away, including the kids arriving home safely.
